content.data:
[Y]Memory Savers
[W]Every byte gets a job.
[c][m.]
[W]Shared buffers and compact data
[W]formats free space for gameplay and
[W]polish.
[W]Bit packing for flags can remove
[W]surprising amounts of overhead.
[c][m.]
[G]- Reuse buffers.
[G]- Pack booleans into bits.
[G]- Avoid duplicate strings.
[m][m-]
[Y]DID YOU KNOW?
[C]Simple compression can rescue a
[C]near-finished build.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
